text: Tōmālōkē ya’tē'i nāthākā kiẏa mr̥tyuraē tōmālōkaka laga pāba'i, yadi'ō tōmālōkē su'ucca sudr̥ṛha durgata arasthāna nakaraā kiẏa. Yadi siham̐tara kōnō kalyāṇa haẏa tēntē siham̐tē kaẏa, ‘ē'iṭō āllāhara taraphara paraā āhichē’, ārau yadi siham̐tara kōnō akalyāṇa haẏa tēntē siham̐tē kaẏa, ‘ē'iṭō tōmāra kāraṇē haichē’. Kōraā, ‘sakalō āllāhara taraphara paraā haẏa’. Ē'i sampradāẏara ki ha’la yē, iham̐tē ēkēbāraē'i kōnō kathā nubujē
